name: A. Desorting
statement:
Call an array a of length n if a_1
leq a_2
leq
ldots
leq a_{n-1}
leq a_n.Ntarsis has an array a of length n. He is allowed to perform one
type of operation on it (zero or more times): Choose an index i (1
leq i
leq n-1). Add 1 to a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_i. Subtract 1 from a_{i+1}, a_{i+2},
ldots, a_n. The values of a can be negative after an operation.Determine
the minimum operations needed to make a .
